title: HTML - CSS
text: I have mastered the basics of HTML and CSS, including structuring a web page, setting up coherent sections and integrating interactive elements such as links or navigation. I can create responsive layouts, customize the visual style with effects (shadows, backgrounds, hover) and adapt the display for different screen formats.

title: Javascript
text: I have mastered the basics of JavaScript, including DOM manipulation, event handling and functions. I can create dynamic interactions on a web page and work with arrays and objects to manage client-side data.

title: React
text: I am able to create interactive interfaces with React, using functional components, props and state. I can manage dynamic rendering, organize the architecture of an application and use complementary libraries to improve the user experience.

title: Project management
text: I can organize and track a development project, define tasks, prioritize features and meet deadlines. I am proficient with tracking tools such as Git, GitHub and project boards, and I can collaborate effectively with a team to deliver quality projects.

title: Optimization and debugging
text: I can identify and fix bugs in code, improve application performance and optimize the user experience. I use debugging tools and best practices to ensure clean, efficient and reliable code.

title: Testing
text: I can perform functional and automated tests to ensure the quality and reliability of applications. I design comprehensive test scenarios, identify and document anomalies, and verify that the product meets all specified requirements. I also analyze results to suggest improvements.
